sql-case.value: CREATE INDEX idx_name ON t_order (name) LOCK=SHARED ALGORITHM=COPY
CREATE INDEX idx_name ON t_order (name) LOCK=SHARED
CREATE INDEX idx_name ON t_order (name) ALGORITHM=COPY
CREATE INDEX idx_name ON t_order (name) ALGORITHM=COPY LOCK=SHARED
CREATE INDEX t_log_index ON t_log (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX t_log_index ON t_log (id)
CREATE INDEX order_index ON t_order (order_id, user_id, status)
CREATE INDEX "order_index" ON "t_order" ("order_id")
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX order_index ON t_order (order_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX order_index ON t_order (order_id) USABLE
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX order_index ON t_order (order_id) UNUSABLE
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX order_index ON t_order (order_id) IMMEDIATE INVALIDATION
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX order_index ON CLUSTER t_cluster
CREATE BITMAP INDEX order_index ON t_order (order_id)
CREATE INDEX from_number_ix ON call_detail_records(from_number) LOCAL PARALLEL NOLOGGING
CREATE BITMAP INDEX is_active_bix ON credit_card_accounts(is_active) LOCAL PARALLEL NOLOGGING
CREATE INDEX i1 ON t1 (c1) ENGINE_ATTRIBUTE='{"key":"value"}';

CREATE INDEX "IDX_ORDER_ID" ON "T_ORDER" ("ORDER_ID") PCTFREE 10 INITRANS 2 MAXTRANS 255 STORAGE( BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT) LOCAL (PARTITION "PARTITION1" PCTFREE 10 INITRANS 2 MAXTRANS 255 LOGGING STORAGE(INITIAL 4096 NEXT 4096 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 40960 PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1 BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT) TABLESPACE "TS_CHNLMGR_BUSI_IDX" , PARTITION "PARTITION2" PCTFREE 10 INITRANS 2 MAXTRANS 255 LOGGING STORAGE(INITIAL 4096 NEXT 4096 MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS 40960 PCTINCREASE 0 FREELISTS 1 FREELIST GROUPS 1 BUFFER_POOL DEFAULT FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT CELL_FLASH_CACHE DEFAULT) TABLESPACE "TS_CHNLMGR_BUSI_IDX" );
CREATE INDEX idx_product_id ON TABLE orders (product_id) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler'
CREATE INDEX idx_order_date ON TABLE orders (order_date) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' WITH DEFERRED REBUILD
CREATE INDEX idx_customer_id ON TABLE customers (customer_id) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' IDXPROPERTIES ('index_priority' = 'high', 'storage_level' = 'memory')
CREATE INDEX idx_product_category ON TABLE products (category) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' IN TABLE idx_products_category
CREATE INDEX idx_sales_region ON TABLE sales (region) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' ROW FORMAT DELIMITED FIELDS TERMINATED BY ',' STORED AS TEXTFILE
CREATE INDEX idx_user_email ON TABLE users (email) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler'
CREATE INDEX idx_order_amount_STATUS ON TABLE orders (status) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' LOCATION '/user/hive/indexes/order_status_idx'
CREATE INDEX idx_customer_country ON TABLE customers (country) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' TBLPROPERTIES ('retention_days' = '30', 'update_frequency' = 'daily')
CREATE INDEX idx_product_price ON TABLE products (price) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' COMMENT 'Index on product price for fast range queries'

CREATE INDEX idx_orders_full ON TABLE orders (order_id, customer_id, order_date) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' WITH DEFERRED REBUILD IDXPROPERTIES ('index_version' = '1.0') IN TABLE idx_orders_data ROW FORMAT DELIMITED STORED AS ORC LOCATION '/user/hive/indexes/orders_full_idx' TBLPROPERTIES ('index_retention_days' = '180') COMMENT 'Full index on orders table with multiple columns and ORC storage'

CREATE INDEX idx_orders_full ON TABLE orders (order_id, customer_id, order_date) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' WITH DEFERRED REBUILD IDXPROPERTIES ('index_version' = '1.0', 'query_optimize' = 'true') IN TABLE idx_orders_data STORED AS ORC LOCATION '/user/hive/indexes/orders_full_idx' TBLPROPERTIES ('index_retention_days' = '180') COMMENT 'Full index on orders table with multiple columns and ORC storage'

CREATE INDEX idx_products_full ON TABLE products (product_id, category, price) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' WITH DEFERRED REBUILD IDXPROPERTIES ('index_type' = 'secondary') IN TABLE idx_products_data STORED BY 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase.HBaseStorageHandler' WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ('hbase.table.name' = 'products:index') LOCATION '/user/hive/indexes/products_full_idx' TBLPROPERTIES ('hbase.mapred.output.key.class' = 'org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.ImmutableBytesWritable') COMMENT 'Full index on products table stored in HBase'
CREATE INDEX idx_order_customer ON TABLE orders (customer_id) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' WITH DEFERRED REBUILD IN TABLE idx_orders_customer

CREATE INDEX idx_product_quantity ON TABLE inventory (quantity) AS 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.index.compact.CompactIndexHandler' LOCATION '/user/hive/indexes/inventory_quantity_idx' TBLPROPERTIES ('storage_policy' = 'hot', 'compression' = 'lzo') COMMENT 'Index on inventory quantity for stock level queries'
CREATE INDEX index1 ON table1 (column1) USING INVERTED
CREATE INDEX index1 ON table1 (column1) USING NGRAM_BF
CREATE INDEX index1 ON table1 (column1) USING ANN
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS index1 ON table1 (column1) USING INVERTED
CREATE INDEX index1 ON table1 (column1) USING INVERTED PROPERTIES ('parser' = 'standard')
CREATE INDEX index1 ON table1 (column1) USING INVERTED COMMENT 'inverted index'
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS index1 ON table1 (column1) USING INVERTED PROPERTIES ('parser' = 'standard') COMMENT 'full syntax'
